name: Adventures in Heaven
summary: Imagine having hundreds of games right at your fingertips. "Adventures In Heaven" is what everyone has been waiting for! It's challenging! Adventurous! Exciting! Mind Boggling! Fun! and Educational! The games vary from challenging your mind, exploring fascinating places, capturing the enemies, using your imagination to escape from the monsters as in the smash hit "Monster Bash", to playing a tetris game, cards & casino games or regular board games such as Chess or Scrabble. This CD features a "State of the Art" Easy to use Menu System, mouse support, file manager and Screen Saver. Game Categories Include: Adventure, arcade, board games, cards & casino, demos, educational games, mind challenge, planes, trains & automobiles, puzzles and mazes, SoundBlaster support, sports, strategy, tetris, top 20 games of 1992 and 1993. This CD will provide the user(s) with hours of entertainment & fun! "Adventures in Heaven" can be enjoyed by all ages!
